sources.title: I'm in the Army Now (1936)
sources.description: Olive tells Popeye and Bluto that she loves a man in a uniform, so they try to sign up at the recruiting station - that can only take one of them. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/im-in-the-army-now-1936/

metadata.Plot: Olive tells the boys she loves a man in a uniform, so they try to sign up at the recruiting station, but they can only take one. There follows a duel of clips from previous shorts as they attempt to prove who is the winner.
metadata.Director: Dave Fleischer, Willard Bowsky, Dave Tendlar
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Gus Wicke
